results.title: Finland: fresh and original
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Visit unspoilt and unhurried Finland at the crossroads between East and West. Learn about the history of Finland and the Swedish influence on this country. Visit the Baltic port of Helsinki, Jyuaskyla and Finland’s second largest city at Tampere with it famous Lutheran cathedral. Step back in time in Turka with its handicraft museum and visit the Sibelius Museum. Travel north to the unspoilt wilderness of Lapland where the Lapps still tend herds of reindeer. Experience a sauna Finnish style.

results.title: Argentina: land of natural wonder
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Geographically, Argentina (which is Spanish for “silver”) is the eighth largest country in the world. This colourful guided tour takes us through the highlights of Argentina’s landscape and history. From chilly Tierra del Fuego, the country’s southern-most region, to Aconcagua, the tallest mountain in the western hemisphere. Much of the program is devoted to the sweeping plains of Patagonia, home of the Argentinian cowboy - the gaucho. The video also introduces us to Argentinian wildlife, the beaches of Mar del Plata, the world’s only growing glacier, Perito Mereno and the sights and nightspots of Buenos Aires.
results.description:

results.title: Bali: A Window on Paradise
results.creator_credit: Michael Heumann, Richard Yerxa and Sonoma Video Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
A comprehensive tour of the beautiful Indonesian island of Bali - its slumbering volcanoes, mountain lakes, lush green rice paddies and intricate temples. Bali, despite its dependence on tourism, still retains its vital four thousand year old culture. The video takes us to Lake Bratan; Ubud, the country’s cultural centre; Mas, famous for its carved wood masks; the port of Singaraja and the beaches of Sanur.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Michael Heumann, Richard Yerxa and Sonoma Video Productions

results.title: Surprising Amsterdam
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Amsterdam is one of the world’s great cities, renowned for its historic and splendid museums and architecture, and its non-stop and exuberant night- life. The video shows us aspects of both medieval and modern Amsterdam. We are taken on a journey of the city’s famed canals. We visit the flower markets, the Van Gogh Museum, the 700 year old Dam Square, the Jewish section which houses the Anne Frank Museum and enjoy a Sunday afternoon in the beautiful gardens of the Vondelpark. Finally, after dark, we take a wander in the infamous “red-light” district.
results.description:

results.title: Mystical Malaysia
results.creator_credit: Michael Jewell, Christopher Zrike, International Video Network and Video Technics International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Your visit to exotic Malaysia begins in the capital, Kuala Lumpur, one of the worlds most fascinating cities. Travel to the famed trading port of Malacca, with its Dutch architecture and gape as worshippers burn paper money in the Temple of Bright Clouds. Journey to Sarawak and ride a native longboat deep into the Borneo jungle.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Michael Jewell, Christopher Zrike, International Video Network and Video Technics International

results.title: Singapore: Crossroads of Asia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Travel to exotic Singapore, the ancient trading port poised on the tip of the Malay peninsula that has become a 21st century commercial centre. Stroll across the Padang to admire Parliament House and the Singapore Cricket Club, visit the temple of Heavenly Happiness, Sultan Mosque and Raffles Hotel, home of the Singapore Sling. Shop on Orchard Road, play on Sentosa Island and cap your visit with a tour of Singapore by trishaw.
results.description:

Shop on Orchard Road, play on Sentosa Island and cap your visit with a tour of Singapore by trishaw.

results.title: Lights, Camera, Los Angeles
results.creator_credit: Jim Settlemoir, Robert F. Gingg and Candlelight Associates
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Discover L.A.’s earliest beginnings at Mission San Gabriel and the busy market place on Olvera Street. Experience the renaissance of downtown L.A. at the Music Centre and Museum of Contemporary Art. We see the Rose Bowl and Pasadena’s Huntington Gardens. Have fun at the famous amusement parks and Griffith Park, then hello to Hollywood and all that glitters!
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jim Settlemoir, Robert F. Gingg and Candlelight Associates

results.title: Japan: The Island Empire
results.creator_credit: Maureen Zrike, Christopher Zrike and International Video Network
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Japan begins to unfold as you enter a Zen temple, then witness an ancient ritual in a Shinto shrine. In the resort of Ibusuki, you will marvel at guests buried to the neck in steaming volcanic sand. Admire the great Buddha of Kamakura and the splendid architecture of 400 year old Himeji Castle. Then plunge into the frantic pace of Tokyo during the Sanja Matsuri Festival.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Maureen Zrike, Christopher Zrike and International Video Network

results.title: Eternal France
results.creator_credit: August von Kageneck, James R. Conner and Kageneck Video
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
From the Roman ruins in Provence to Napoleon’s Arc de Triomphe in Paris, the rich history and culture of France awaits you. Wander inside the majestic Cathedrals of Reims and Chartres. Watch the artistry of glass-makers in Baccarat, the lacemakers in the Auvergne and silk painters in Lyon. Then, marvel at the beauty and mystery of Brittany’s stunning abbey of Mont-Saint-Michel.
results.creator_credit_for_label: August von Kageneck, James R. Conner and Kageneck Video

results.title: Athens and the Greek Spirit
results.creator_credit: Britta Halling, Frank Gorin and Calcon
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video visits”.
Tour bustling Plaka, just below the Acropolis. Watch the changing of the guard outside the Parliament building, then tour the Academy. A view of the Greek Islands - tour the Acropolis and marvel at the Parthenon.
